text.section: Except as provided in KRS 271B.13-270, as soon as the proposed corporate action is taken, or upon receipt of a payment demand, the corporation shall pay each dissenter who complied with KRS 271B.13-230 the amount the corporation estimates to be the fair value of his shares, plus accrued interest.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 131, effective January 1, 1989.
